0x0029f9d1603e4a91cc646473c40e103acf8d1b.name: Olas Competitions Registry
0x0029f9d1603e4a91cc646473c40e103acf8d1b.description: Allows users to interact with the Olas competitions registry contract.

methods.name: Register User
methods.description: A method to register a new world id verified user.

0x07337123974693342d97a1d27670796793cfec.name: Olas Competition
0x07337123974693342d97a1d27670796793cfec.description: Allows users to interact with the Olas competition contract.

methods.name: Cast Vote
methods.description: A method that allows users to cast a vote for a market in a competition.

methods.name: Claim Market Refund
methods.description: A method that allows users to claim their VP (Voting Power) refund for a terminated market in a competition.

0x060cf2cc62fb1b4096ff552016b73bc60c85b0.name: Olas Reward Token
0x060cf2cc62fb1b4096ff552016b73bc60c85b0.description: Allows users to interact with the Olas reward token contract.

methods.name: Claim Airdrop
methods.description: A method that allows users to claim their airdrop allocation.

methods.name: Burn For VP
methods.description: A method that allows users to burn their olas reward token in exchange for additional VP (Voting Power).
